— a surprisingly beautiful and quiet town south of Rethymno off the old road to Heraklion, famous for its ceramic cottage industry. Look around the village before buying; some workshops are hidden gems, others are low-quality tourist traps.

Chania airport is much smaller and far less busy than Heraklion airport. The distance from Heraklion to Rethymno is 80 km and from Chania to Rethymno 45 km
